Sentencas: This work analyses the impact of different support schemes on the retail price of micro-combined heat and power units based on solid oxide fuel cells in the residential sector.
Titulo: Techno-economic and policy requirements for the market-entry of the fuel cell micro-CHP system in the residential sector

Sentencas: The implications of each incentive toward the technical implementation of the technology are also analyzed.
Titulo: Techno-economic and policy requirements for the market-entry of the fuel cell micro-CHP system in the residential sector

Sentencas: A detailed techno-economic assessment of the micro-combined heat and power unit is provided considering the best-in-class ceramic fuel cell technology and today's costs for gas and electricity in the residential sector.
Titulo: Techno-economic and policy requirements for the market-entry of the fuel cell micro-CHP system in the residential sector

Sentencas: The Italian case study was used to evaluate the impact of different supporting schemes.
Titulo: Techno-economic and policy requirements for the market-entry of the fuel cell micro-CHP system in the residential sector

Sentencas: In order to further extend the validity of our research, scenarios for Germany and Denmark are simulated and discussed.
Titulo: Techno-economic and policy requirements for the market-entry of the fuel cell micro-CHP system in the residential sector

Sentencas: For large-family residential users consuming 9000 kWh of electricity yearly, the retail price that yields a five year pay-back-time - without any incentive - is similar to 2500 (sic).
Titulo: Techno-economic and policy requirements for the market-entry of the fuel cell micro-CHP system in the residential sector

Sentencas: Under the same assumptions, for the average family with a consumption of around 3500 kWh, the required price is similar to 650 (sic).
Titulo: Techno-economic and policy requirements for the market-entry of the fuel cell micro-CHP system in the residential sector

Sentencas: In both cases, a retail price that is four and seven time higher respectively is achieved with the Feed-in Tariff (FIT) scheme of the type currently in use in the United Kingdom.
Titulo: Techno-economic and policy requirements for the market-entry of the fuel cell micro-CHP system in the residential sector

Sentencas: A modified Feed-in Tariff is finally proposed to support on-site consumption rather than generation with export to the grid.
Titulo: Techno-economic and policy requirements for the market-entry of the fuel cell micro-CHP system in the residential sector
